page.title: 08FARMING-KELSTON WEST OF BATH
page.content: There are four farms in Kelston,they are Park Farm-286 acres,Manor Farm-220,Roundhill Farm-260 acres and Mill Farm 192-acres.Mr Parkfield rents Park Farm and Manor Farm.They are both arable and dairy farms. Roundhill Farm is rented by Mr and Mrs Dinham it is a dairy farm.Mill Farm, owned by Mr and Mrs Cullimore,is a mixed farm.All the farmers said they would like their children to take over the farm when they retire.Roundhill Farm has 85 milking cows (dairy short horns)115 followers (cows that have started giving milk)They also have poultry and they deliver their milk around Kelston.Manor Farm has 100 young cattle and crops. Park Farm has got 162 cows (friesians) and crops. At Mill Farm they have sheep, beef cattle goats and other animals. They also provide cream teas in summer.
